interfaces

Interface RefereeSiteInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RefereeSite

    public interface RefereeSiteInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Operational interface of a remote object of type RefereeSite. It provides the functionality to access the RefereeSite.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int announceNewGame()
      Operation announceNewGame Method called by the referee announce a new game
      ReturnBoolean declareGameWinner(int position_rope)
      Operation declareGameWinner It is called by the referee to Declare the game winner based on the position of the rope
      int declareMatchWinner()
      Operation declareMatchWinner It is called by the referee to declare the match winner based on the number of games won
      boolean getEndOfMatch()
      Method to check if the match has ended
      void shutdown()
      Operation server shutdown.

                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        position_rope - indicates the position of the rope

        java.rmi.RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
